CustomField.formula: IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Rebid"), Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c > Current_Contract_Value__c ) , Current_Contract_Value__c , IF(AND( ISPICKVAL( Type , "Rebid"), Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c <= Current_Contract_Value__c ) , Annual_Contractual_Revenue__c,0))
CustomField.label: Rebid Value
